Mortgage Insurance Manufactured: N/A for 95.015-97%, 30% for 90.01%-95%, 25% for 85.01%- 90%, 12% for 80.01%-85%. For FICO under 640, BPMI Monthly MI and Lender-Paid MI are the only permitted MI. For manufactured properties, BPMI Monthly MI is the only permitted MI. Manufactured Homes CLTV and HCLTV are not to exceed the LTV. Temporary Buydowns Temporary Buydowns not available. Escrow Waiver See Escrow Waiver Policy for eligibility and state criteria Fees and Cost Cash-out less than or equal to $250. Excess proceeds may be applied as a curtailment on the new loan. The borrower must have a reduction in interest rate of at least 50 basis points. Borrower Benefit The borrower must have a reduction in the monthly payment that includes principal, interest and the mortgage insurance payment (if applicable) of at least $1.00. Products Not Offered By UWM: See Products Not Offered Job Aid for list of products not currently offered by UWM.
